doc.previous: National Pizza Month is an observance that occurs for the month of October every year in the United States and some areas of Canada.[46][47][48][49] This observance began in October 1984, and was created by Gerry Durnell, the publisher of Pizza Today magazine.[49] During this time, some people observe National Pizza Month by consuming various types of pizzas or pizza slices, or going to various pizzerias.[46]
